description:
In this "Walkthrough" class, we will go step-by-step through every important step for setting up a robust E-Commerce system in Wordpress. After the walkthrough, our website will have the ability to:

  • Take credit card orders
  • Manage taxes (sales tax)
  • Offer digital downloads
  • Generate passive income
  • And much more!

BONUS! This class also comes with a monster discount to my full Wordpress class. So if you take this class and need some more help with Wordpress, that class is available to you at over 70% off the normal price.
title: E-Commerce with Wordpress - Setup Walkthrough!
